Question: I owe this person a real debt ...it was because of her that I played the Mocambo, a very popular nightclub in the '50s.
Hints: On June 29, 1956, this person married playwright Arthur Miller, in a civil ceremony in White Plains, New York.
This person received positive reviews for her performance and was in a strong position to negotiate with 20th Century Fox.
Logan had studied under Constantin Stanislavski, approved of method acting, and was supportive of this person.
